column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Jinora says : " Wow , the statue room . "
#Text=Tenzin says : " That 's right , Jinora , the most sacred place in the entire Southern Air Temple .
#Text=I 've the greatest air scooter - er of all time !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Meelo !
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Korra , you have every right to be mad at me .
#Text=But I do n't want you to make the same mistake I made .
#Text=I should never have gone into that forest , and we should n't be going to the South Pole now .
#Text=Spirits and the physical world should remain separate .
#Text=" Korra says : " Dad , it 's my job to be the bridge between the spirits and the physical world , and I finally have a chance to live up to my potential .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " You do n't even know if what Unalaq says is true .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " You want proof ?
#Text=Look to the sky .
#Text=Where I 'm from , the spirits are at peace and they light up the dark .
#Text=" Korra says : " The Northern Lights .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Yes .
#Text=There used to be lights at the South as well , but during the Hundred Year War , the South was thrown out of balance and the lights disappeared .
#Text=When the War ended , the North helped to rebuild you physically , as a nation , but we have not rebuilt you spiritually .
#Text=Now the spirits no longer dance in your skies .
#Text=Instead , they rampage in the Everstorm .
#Text=" Mako says : " I think we 're here .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Is that what I think it is ?
#Text=" Unalaq says : " We must keep moving .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh man , I really do n't like this .
#Text=" Mako says : " Bolin , just stay calm , there 's no reason to - panic !
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Korra , look out !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Oh , it 's in the engine !
#Text=Aaaahhhhh !
#Text="
